incoming_call.text: Thank you for calling Southern Smiles, this is [Name]. Who do I have the pleasure of speaking with?

patient_type.text: Thank you [Pt Name]. Are you a new or existing patient of the practice?

new_patient.text: Great! We always welcome new patients to our practice. Hey [Pt name], is the number you're calling from ending in XXXX, the best number to reach you, just in case the call drops?

record_np_log.text: Thank you for that [Pt Name]. How can I help you today?

patient_pushback.text: I'm sorry [Pt Name], Our phone system is over the internet, and sometimes it just drops, and we wanna be able to make sure we can reach you back.

apologize_move_on.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let's move on with how I can help you today.

existing_patient.text: Welcome back [Pt Name], how can I help you today?

insurance_question.text: That's a great question! We do have a lot of patients in our practice with various insurance plans. To better assist you, can I ask you how you found out about us?

access_insurance.text: That's a great question! We do have a lot of patients in our practice that have Access. They choose to come to us because we can see them quickly and offer quality care at affordable prices. First, can I ask you how you found out about us?

private_insurance.text: That's a great question! We do have a lot of patients in our practice that have that insurance. Each plan is different. So, to better assist you, can I ask you how you found out about us?

insurance_followup.text: Thank you [Pt name]. To better answer your insurance questions, can you tell me more about what you're looking for? Just an exam and cleaning, an emergency, or is there something else?

routine_exam.text: I'm Happy to hear you are interested in making sure your teeth and gums are healthy. Unfortunately, Access in Arizona, does not cover cleanings. Even routine ones. What I can do, is have you use our office savings plan, which gives you a full exam with all the x-rays you need, along with 2 cleanings for the year, for only $150. Would you be interested in that?

emergency.text: I'm sorry to hear that you are having this emergency. We need to get you in as soon as possible for Dr. Shkally to take a look. For us to do an exam and x-ray and tell you the best way to take care of that, it would be $37 out of pocket. We can see you as soon as [earliest available emergency slot]. Will that work for you?

choices.text: No, I thought insurance covered that

explain_emergency_options.text: Access does cover emergencies, but it's very limited. Like I said, we have a lot of access patients that come to our practice, because we can see them quickly, and provide them with quality work at affordable prices. I recommend you come in and worse case, it's 37$ and Dr. Shakally can get you antibiotics and get you out of pain, until you can get in somewhere that is able to better utilize your insurance than we can. We can see you as soon as [earliest available emergency slot]. Does that work for you?

offer_followup.text: That's completely understandable to want to find somewhere that is free. With this being an emergency, you want to take care of it quickly before it becomes a bigger issue. Is it okay to give you a call by end of day to see, if you were able to get everything taken care of?

end_call_emergency.text: That is completely understandable [Pt Name]. Please don't hesitate to reach back if you still need any help.

schedule_followup.text: Great. I will reach back to you then

offer_alternative_cleaning.text: That's completely understandable, we can also offer you our one time Exam, x-ray cleaning fee of $116. We can see you as soon as [earliest prophy appointment]. Will that work for you?

offer_followup_cleaning.text: That's completely understandable that you want somewhere that is cheaper. The fact that you are looking to take care of your teeth is important to us. Since we truly believe we are the best place for new patients on Access looking for cleanings, is it okay if I reach back out to you by the end of the day to see if make sure you got in somewhere?

schedule_appointment.text: Awesome! Let me grab a few things from you to finalize your profile, then I can make you an appointment. Is that okay?

schedule_emergency.text: Awesome! Let me grab a few things from you to finalize your profile, then I can confirm your appointment. Is that okay?

create_profile.text: Great, let me create your profile. Can you please provide your date of birth, home address, and email address?

confirm_appointment.text: Okay we have your appointment set up for [appointment time]. I'm going to text you 3 forms to your phone. Fill them out as soon as possible. That way when you come in, it's a very quick process. If you have any trouble with them, please let me know.

something_else.text: I understand. Could you please provide more details about what you're looking for?

end_call.text: Thank you for calling Southern Smiles. We look forward to seeing you soon. Have a great day!
